A message from your friendly manufacturing rep here @ Proto Labs
It was my pleasure to meet with Senator Baldwin today to talk about the value Start up businesses bring to the community.  We appreciate her support and leadership. #senatorbaldwin #steamchain

- Manages and excels at a highly agile consultative sales process, from researching and prospecting prospective accounts to solution presentation and opportunity closing.- Orchestrates and takes part in the collection and analysis of clients' key business issues and requirements during initial discovery workshops and the requirements gathering stage.- Directs and works alongside SMEs to develop creative and pragmatic strategies to solve clients business problems and help them exploit opportunities. - Recognizes and applies key insights and information from our clients in order to craft account based sales strategies. - Develops, presents, and closes opportunities in person, virtually, or via phone. - Works to develop and expand additional business opportunities within existing client relationships through ongoing management and contact.- Helps current clients plan and budget for their upcoming strategic and discretionary technology initiatives. - Oversees my current and ongoing projects, through communication with both the client and internal teams.- Mentors newly hired accounting executives, to ensure their comfort and understanding of our services and proprietary delivery models - Influences and participates ongoing internal improvement initiatives such as our service delivery model, Salesforce CRM platform, and cross department continuity initiatives.- Actively builds and maintains internal relationships throughout the company's departments to ensure the best in client service and work efficiencies.- Tracks and records sales activities daily.

- Managed a territory of over 900 current customers throughout the US - Was responsible for a quota of over 1.5 million in annual revenue per quarter in maintenance renewal dollars- Worked proactively and re-actively with our customer base to resolve any issues or problems before and after their maintenance expiration date expired- Provided weekly forecasts to the management team with updated statuses on each individual customer- Regularly negotiated annual contract renewals with current customers- Sold the need for maintenance and support to wavering customers

- Contacted key decision-makers in a variety of small to medium-sized businesses across the US and generated interest in our products- Conducted market research to be followed up by our Sales Managers in the field- Developed knowledge of Epicor’s Enterprise Resource Management software and apply that knowledge to the first steps of the sales process with decision makers of manufacturing businesses-Managed and contacted manufacturing businesses in a four state territory to generate and drive new business- Personally developed a template that bridged the communication between territory manager and prospect later implemented throughout the whole sales department

recommendations: Jeff Bloom
Solutions Architect at The Nerdery
April 5, 2017, Matt worked with Jeff in the same group

I've worked with Matt for the better part of the past two years.  In his role as a Senior Account Executive, he has been responsible for building relationships and structuring engagements for some of our most complex and strategic clients.  Where Matt excels is in his ability to deeply understand and contribute to all facets of the engagements he sells and manages - from helping to drive to a specific detailed technical approach with our internal teams, to defining the overarching strategy to employ that best supports clients' larger business objectives.  He has an exceptional capacity to navigate conversations with both technical audiences and non-technical and C-Level audiences while still maintaining the integrity of what's being communicated.  On top of all this, he possesses a high degree of professionalism and polish that resonates extremely well with the strategic clients he most often works with.  I've truly enjoyed working with Matt, and have zero doubt that he will be successful in whatever he chooses to pursue in the future.

Matt was an integral part in the personal and professional development of myself and many other people in the BDR organization. I would recommend Matt for any future endeavor and would gladly work with him again!
